::English::
===========
Genero: App Windows
Language: Multilingual

Description:

Powerful finish of every editor in one package. Magic Bullet Suite 10 is a collection of eight software applications used for professional color correction, enhancement, and film production in Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro and Apple Final Cut Pro. It includes full support for Adobe CS5 and three new products: Magic Bullet Denoiser, Magic Bullet, Magic Bullet Grinder PhotoLooks.

Content:

Red Giant Software: Magic II bullet colorist
Magic Bullet Windows II Colorist
Colorist II brings the power of systems of high quality color directly to your desktop. Get a new and revolutionary system for professional color correction favorite editing application.

Red Giant Software: Magic Bullet 1.0 Denoiser
Denoiser magic bullet for Windows 1.0
Do not settle for a lot of video noise. Magic Bullet Denoiser makes everything easy to use tool that gives you great results without effort. Traditional methods of removing noise can distort the fine details, but Denoisers accurate motion estimation algorithms guarantee high-quality video. Denoisers default settings work well for most shots on the right of the box. Enjoy even more customizable controls let you easily soften unsightly stains and chroma noise reduction approach in shadowed regions.

Red Giant Software: Magic Bullet Frames 1.1
Magic Bullet Frames 1.1, Windows
Take interlaced video and get the look of 24p film directly from the publisher at high speed and high quality. Now Adobe little CS5/64 compatibleRed giant software: Magic Bullet Grinder 1.0.2
Magic Bullet Grinder 1.0.2 MAC
Turn your DSLR / HDSLR video editing formats to use, add the timecode, and Web proxies generate the resolution, all in a single step, saving time.

Red Giant Software: Magic Bullet Instant HD 1.2
Magic Bullet Instant HD 1.2, Windows
High quality conversion from SD to HD video on your favorite video application. Instant HD controls easy to make a snap to convert standard-definition clips to sharp, clear HD with outstanding results.

Now Adobe CS5/64 hardly compatible

Red Giant Software: Magic Bullet Looks 1.4
Magic Bullet Looks 1.4 of Windows
Now you can define the style of your video or film with powerful imaging tools. Choose from over 100 Look presets, to help set the mood for everything from a wedding to the next Sundance original.

Red Giant Software: Magic Bullet 1.2 Mojo
Mojo Windows 1.2, magic bullet
Mojo introduces the element of a Hollywood blockbuster to the footage with a single click, so skin tones pop while adding drama and contrast without any shooting problems.

Red Giant Software: Magic Bullet 1.5 PhotoLooks
Magic Bullet 1.5, Windows PhotoLooks
Set the mood and lighting of your photos easily and quickly with powerful new imaging tools inspired by the camera. PhotoLooks use in Photoshop or as a standalone application. Choose from over 100 seems to default, or create your own. Now Available for Lightroom, Aperture
